title: Add XLM-V
raw_output:
{'files_to_modify': ['src/transformers/models/xlm_v/configuration_xlm_v.py', 'src/transformers/models/xlm_v/modeling_xlm_v.py', 'src/transformers/models/xlm_v/tokenization_xlm_v.py', 'src/transformers/models/xlm_v/__init__.py', 'src/transformers/__init__.py'], 'reasoning': "1. configuration_xlm_v.py holds the configuration logic and model hyperparameters for XLM-V.
2. modeling_xlm_v.py implements the XLM-V model architecture (PyTorch code), required for loading and running the model.
3. tokenization_xlm_v.py contains the tokenizer implementation, especially important due to XLM-V's novel vocabulary mechanics.
4. __init__.py within xlm_v/ ensures the module exposes its API and ties together model, config, and tokenizer for local imports.
5. src/transformers/__init__.py is needed to globally register and expose XLM-V so the rest of the library and end-users can access the new model class. Auto-mapping files (e.g., modeling_auto.py) may need updates if AutoModel support for XLM-V is desired, for seamless integration."}
